entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
